message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and excellence. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we believe its true value exceeds $150. Considering its unique qualities, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product for $180. I understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so if this price aligns with what you perceive the product to be worth, I would be delighted to proceed with the sale. Let me know how you feel about this offer.
